name: Evacuation: Enceladus
description:
All hands to battle stations!

The moon of Enceladus, and the entirety of the solar system, has come under sudden attack. Take seat in the cockpit of a starfighter and defend the escaping refugees. 

This game was created during the month of December 2022 for the "Game Devcember Jam", utilizing the theme Déjà-vu. It's brief.

The musical rendition of the 4th movement of Antonín Dvořák's 'New World' Symphony No. 9 is taken from a recording registered in the public domain and is used with permission. It has been modified from its original version.
